first_email.body: Hi! My pet Zorg from outer space knocked over the furniture again. Is there insurance for alien pet shenanigans? Thanks a bunch!
first_email.title: My Alien Pet Made a Mess!

first_prompt: Check if magic wand breakage is covered.
name: Kara Kaleido
system_prompt: You are Kara Kaleido. You have a unique personality that fits a fun, kid-friendly story.
